title: I really wish Taliyah was reverted to pre 6.14
body:
For one most people who did ask for the change WEREN'T EVEN EXPERIENCED WITH THE CHAMPION
and did it even lead to any good? It just ended up making an already strong champion, easier which for a fact is probably not a good idea, which then led to her being nerfed repeatedly
If we start from her PBE release
(PBE)Okay but people begged her W to change even when they barely have any experience with her>(Released)Weak>Good but could use work>Buffed again and starts seeing some LCS play>The chaos of post-6.14 to follow where she was picked a lot more in competitive play>Nerf>nerf>Gutted state for awhile>Buffed slightly(Which isn't even enough)

The nerfs probably could have been avoided altogether if 6.14 NEVER HAPPENED, although this is 
So was it really necessary to change her W?

replies.body: I think she is still in a fine spot, such an underrated champion. Barely have any problems hitting my W - E combo
I can accept the 6.14 nerfs, it still does decent damage but she needs her waveclear again and to get rid of that god awful vector casting on her W
The only people who think anything from 6.14 onwards as good are the ignorant ones who know nothing.

i agree,  her q and e are fine as it is, if you can keep up in farm q will push the lane like it used to, e was perfect to brgin with. W change, however, killed her dueling/burst potential.  its just too readable now with too long of a delay.
